pr_title: [NETBEANS-4486] Fixed unit tests for Latte Templates

timeline.bodyText: Well, should comment out them with the reason if test data doesn't exist.
timeline.author: junichi11

replies.bodyText:
Test files were not part of donation.
Similar problem is in Symfony and Symfony 2 modules.
I sent question to dev@ about it.
replies.author: KacerCZ

replies.bodyText:
Test files were not part of donation.

I know it. Many files were removed on the donation review of Oracle. Because of something problem.

I sent question to dev@ about it.

Please add it to the description (some people might not check all emails like me...).
It would be nice if you can add the link for the thread.
I've replied.
replies.author: junichi11

replies.bodyText: It is definitely pity that these files are not donated. They were tested from some reason.
replies.author: tmysik

replies.bodyText:
Files in Oracle repository are here: https://hg.netbeans.org/releases/file/5fd841261bf9/php.latte/test/unit/data/testfiles/indent
They were not donated probably because they weren't from Oracle - copyright says author is Ondřej Brejla.
I'm not sure what exactly they were testing. Maybe replacing them with newly created sample files can be enough.
replies.author: KacerCZ

replies.bodyText:
Ondra was my colleague working on the PHP support in NetBeans so - it is weird :)
@obrejla Ondro, could we simply use those files and add them in this review? Don't you remember/know the origin of the files? :) Thanks!
replies.author: tmysik

replies.bodyText: Hehe, it's a real file from my Eciovni package https://github.com/obrejla/Eciovni ...You can definitely use it for testing :)
replies.author: obrejla

replies.bodyText: And imho it was testing that the parser will not break the parsing loop on a real-world valid file. But you know...it's 10 years already 🤷‍♂️
replies.author: obrejla
tmysik

replies.bodyText:
I tried it yesterday, but failed with file encoding problems.
See https://lists.apache.org/thread.html/ra565c8b965dada529eaed747a2e0ef1aa3aedae8fdc02b570550cdfc%40%3Cdev.netbeans.apache.org%3E
replies.author: KacerCZ

replies.bodyText:
This advice does not work?

For testing purposes, I'd suggest to place a FileEncodingQueryImpl into
MockLookup in the tests, as here:
org.openide.text.DataEditorSupportEncodingTest
replies.author: tmysik

replies.bodyText: It worked, so I updated PR and added two real lile tests.
replies.author: KacerCZ

timeline.bodyText: I don't think that it's good to remove them completely. They should have been added for some reason. Someone might be able to fix them in the future (although I didn't check what they were tests for, I'm not sure whether we can fix). So, we should comment them out with the reason(e.g. test files were not donated) if you don't fix them.
timeline.author: junichi11

replies.bodyText: I returned methods, commented and added explanation as you suggested.
replies.author: KacerCZ

timeline.bodyText: Silly question: are these tests invalid/outdated for some reason ? The content of testRealFile_03/04 seems to reside in HG, and seems as a copy of https://github.com/obrejla/Pollie/blob/master/OndrejBrejla/Pollie/PollieForm.latte
timeline.author: sdedic

replies.bodyText: I'll add them after correct way how to include them will be consulted with @matthiasblaesing .
replies.author: KacerCZ

replies.bodyText: Remainig test files were added. They contain link to source and license (New BSD License).
replies.author: KacerCZ

timeline.message:
[NETBEANS-4483] Fixed unit tests for Latte Templates

https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/NETBEANS-4486

- Deleted tests related to files removed during donation from Oracle.
- Deleted unused files.
- Fixed loading of files containig UTF-8 characters (test
  LatteCompletionTest::testCompletion_03() was failing because of this).
- Enabled tests in Travis and Github Actions.

  LatteCompletionTest::testCompletion_03() was failing because of this).
- Enabled tests in Travis and Github Actions.

- Enabled tests in Travis and Github Actions.
